website_summaries.verdict: If you want high-quality aquarium decor with ample hiding spots, choose the Penn-Plax model instead.
pros: Resembles natural plant-like root material for fish to swim around
Its 12-inch height makes it ideal for large aquariums
cons: It has some rough edges, and some testers found that the paint tends to chip over time

customer_reviews.title: Mangrove Root
customer_reviews.text: I placed this in my 220 gallon aquarium. I think it looks great. That said as I’ve read in other reviews this did indeed come with a piece broken off. So a new way of packing should definitely be looked into. I have to edit my review. This ornament shouldn’t be used in an aquarium for fish. I noticed my fish scraping there bodies quite a bit and decided to check the new ornaments; when I pulled this out of my tank it not only had an horrible smell but a lot of debris came out of it. I wouldn’t recommend this ornament for any aquarium.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: A few of the other ratings mentioned bad smell and issues once water got in
customer_reviews.text: Same exact ornament found in local shop exactly. Half the price. I was worried after some of the reviews. I have had this in my tank for 3 months now without issue. I did hot glue all of the openings so that water would not go inside. A few of the other ratings mentioned bad smell and issues once water got in. I am completely satisfied with this purchase oitside of the liytle extra work. Thus the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: leon

customer_reviews.title: Great, huge
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large and am SO happy with it. It came with one small part broken in the box but it was an easy fix. It is larger than I had originally thought and the coloring is very cool. It's the centerpiece of my aquarium and the fish love swimming through it. I filed down one sharp edge before adding. Tank is 29 gallons, 30" long, 18" tall, 12" wide
customer_reviews.author: Carly K.

customer_reviews.title: and I think it's been a nice enrichment item
customer_reviews.text: I put the large size in my ball python's tank and it's worked out well. It can support her weight while she climbs on it without breaking or falling over, and I think it's been a nice enrichment item. I have not run into any issues with mold/fungus like some other people here have, but it could just be the difference between using this in air vs underwater (though the ball python tank is pretty humid). Some edges are sharp enough that I might be worried about some fish's fins, but not sharp enough to hurt a person's skin.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Large and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Great quality, awesome look. Fits perfectly in my 29G Cichlid tank. Couldn't be happier! This looks great under my LED lighting and my fish seem to enjoy using it to swim around.
customer_reviews.author: Bwaterman

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, some sharp spots
customer_reviews.text: This looks fantastic. I have read some complaints by reviewers that the hollowness lead to a mold/smell. It's still new so I can't speak to that truthfully. However, I still bought it because I've never had an issue with hollow decorations previously. I did make sure to allow the inside to completely fill with water and expel all air before flipping over in the tank. I don't think there will be an issue if you remove all the air. Deducted a star, because there were some sharp bits that I think are too sharp and needed to be shaved off before safe for fish.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: TOXIC
customer_reviews.text: Thing was poisonous, turned my fish tank into a rot smelling acidic pool. The paint must be toxic or lead based, it started peeling off and turned my sand black. DO NOT BUY OR PUT IN A FISHTANK!
customer_reviews.author: Tim McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Minor mods required
customer_reviews.text: I experienced the same sourdough bread foul odor that some people described caused by anaerobic bacteria build up. This condition is easily rectified by drilling/breaking holes in the top of the decor, as well as around the sides at various heights. The bacteria build up is caused by trapped air pockets inside the decoration. Adding holes, placing the item in an area of good water circulation, and the addition of beneficial bacteria supplements has cured the odor.
customer_reviews.author: barnbarn

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Horrible cheap plastic, a small part of it chipped off and my fish tried to eat it. Took it out ao fast. :( Looks cool but it truly wasn't worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Annon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Natural Looking
customer_reviews.text: This piece looks great in my 120 gallon tank. It is a very large piece and is made of reain, not wood. Sinks and anchors to the bottom quickly and will bubble a bit for a while, but it looks incredibly natural in the water. Would not be good for smaller tanks, but for larger ones this is a great piece.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are wrong but quality item; too sharp for fish
customer_reviews.text: Note this is 9 inches WIDE x 11.2 long x 12.7 TALL, so it fits better than expected in my fish tank. When I ordered the dimensions between wide & tall were mixed up so I thought the fit would be super tight, so it's better than expected. UPDATE: the sharp edges were too much I had to remove it from the tank. It’s not good for fish because they will get scraped/cut.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Not good for aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Received the item poorly packaged. One end root was broken but I was able to super glue it and put it in the aquarium. It’s now about 6 weeks since I put it down n the aquarium and the color has started fading away. The base plastic is visible all over now. I will have to throw this and replace with some real driftwood. What a waste of money. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sub-z

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly where I had in mind. From a distance it looks aesthetically pleasing, but it certainly doesn't look natural when you're up close to the tank. It arrived double boxed and in styrofoam and perfectly intact. I have a 75 gallon aquarium with three Turtles so I needed something sturdy for them to rest on. This did the trick, I just wish it was made from the same material or close to the Driftwood that is sitting below it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen P.

customer_reviews.title: Way too tall
customer_reviews.text: My 20 gallon long is twelve inches high with out gravel. This was listed as 9 inches tall...Even without gravel this is way too tall, at least 13 inches. I had to remove aquarium cover to have this in tank. The light strip just barely touched this sitting on the aquarium. Really disappointed in that aspect but than that it's great looking. But I think I am going back I box it up and keep it for a later time when I get a bigger tank. I saw something better and ten inches tall at pet smart so might get that tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: J. Buke

customer_reviews.title: Beardies gave it a 5
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my baby bearded dragons, they definitely seem to approve. They were climbing all over it and basking in the “sun” shortly after introducing it to them. Although it is a little bit tall for a 40L we angled it the width of the tank (and made sure it was secure!) for the moments they leap from hammock, to the tree, or their hideout hallow stump. I personally love the real feel and look that it has to it. Would definitely recommend and purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Dlynn

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy- BACTERIA SMELL
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers mentioned the peeling color and awful stench. I dodn't listen and bought it anyways. Looked GREAT for a couple of months but then paint started to peel off and the odor from it was overwhelming. Big waste of money. Should have listened.
customer_reviews.author: Erica B

customer_reviews.title: The finish came off!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape and size of this item but shortly after I got it I realized to finish was coming off and leaving a dull gray surface to everything. It looks very ugly. I tried again to see if I can get a better product and again the paint is coming off within less than a week these things are a waste of money. The first one I got was very nice I've had it 3 years and it still looks pretty but the recent ones are not the way they should be
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: unique root aquarium decoration
customer_reviews.text: This artificial mangrove root serves as the centerpiece in my turtle tank. It's the perfect size for my 40 gallon tank, tall enough to almost hit the top of the water and wide enough to stay rooted in the sand. I was initially concerned about my turtles getting stuck in between the holes, but it hasn't been an issue. The turtles just use it to balance while they come up for air, and my pleco bottom feeder likes to hide in the middle of the mangrove root while eating algae off of the sides.
customer_reviews.author: K. Venesky

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this. Others don't even come close to this! I would definitely recommend this for 10 gallon tanks and up. Gorgeous!!! I definitely recommend and looks exactly like the picture. Even better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Looks Like Art in Our 55 Gallon!
customer_reviews.text: OUTSTANDING! A fantastic focal point! Looks like real wood. Fish love it! I saw the other reviews that were negative and I had none of these issues occur. It arrived packaged perfectly. No odor, however whenever I get new decor I first change my water. I then put the nee decor into my old water in my water change bucket and let it sit for a week. Of course sometimes you are so excited you cant wait a week :)
customer_reviews.author: Tori Detroit

customer_reviews.title: It's hollow and starts to smell when left in water
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my aquarium and it looked great. However, when I recently took it out, there was a ton of gunk that came out of the holes in the bottom. I'm going to seal this up before I put it back in the aquarium so it doesn't do this again.
customer_reviews.author: Old Guy Streaming

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.looks great in aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Came as pictured, no problems. Looks great in my aquarium. True to size and description. I had purchased a different piece that came with a lot of sharp edges -very sharp. I returned that piece and chose this. Very happy. No sharp edges and fish seem to like it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Strong Odor from Large Mangrove Root
customer_reviews.text: As some purchasers have stated. I did notice some flaking of the paint. I removed this decoration after doing a routine water change. I am not a marine or freshwater biologist. Once the water level was low enough to expose this to the air. I immediately smelled something very unpleasant coming from the aquarium. I have a few similar decorations in the aquarium and this was the first time I have experienced a problem with odor. This item is removed from the aquarium. It maybe fine for a reptile tank where it is not submerged in water. I would not recommend it for aquarium use.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Description
customer_reviews.text: Description says the large is 9 inches tall. Just recieved item and its 12 inches tall, wont fit in my tank.
customer_reviews.author: Gavonna F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice feature in the tank
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in June and waited to see if I would have any issues with it and I haven't. It looks great in the tank and the fish are always swimming through it and the shrimp like to sit all over it. I haven't had the issues of smell or product quality of some of the reviewers either. I just do my regular water changes and use Seachem stability and my water tests are good and there's no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana CTop Contributor: Aquascaping

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months took out to clean and like other reviews it stinks. I knew this before I got it so I even drilled drain holes in it before first use to try and change the water inside but didn’t work. Also when I cleaned it just running tap water on it all the color came off so it is just plain plastic grey now.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Looks Real!!
customer_reviews.text: Gear! Looks just like real wood! This is how big it looks in my 55 gal (48 long x 15 wide x 21 deep)I have 2 pieces of real driftwood and couldn’t find real driftwood that was a this big for a decent price. I love the shape of it and it looks amazing with live plants around and through out it.
customer_reviews.author: MotherOfDachshunds

customer_reviews.title: Mangrove Root
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to see how well this would hold up since so many others had problems with the paint. I can honestly say that I haven't had a bit of a problem. I have it in my 65 gallon tank now for 6 months and it still looks great. I'm very pleased with it and the fish loved swimming all through it. I love that I can sit across the room and watch the fish swimming through it. Makes a nice center piece with the other piece I have in there. Nice natural looking piece.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these and they are already loosing the paint on them. I am really disappointed in these. They will be out of my tank soon. So pass on them
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great for rodents too!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my fancy mice’s all time favorite toy. They love climbing all over it, nesting underneath it, and even perching on the top. I love it because it helps keep their claws short sense it’s textures, there are plenty of books and crannies To hide treats in, and it’s super easy to wash off sense it’s actually made to be in water. Absolutely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy
customer_reviews.text: I did what another person said to do though comments and I sealed the open ends with a hot glue gun to prevent and build up of algae. With that being said ,it's great. The fish love swimming through it , it looks great and I haventvhad to clean it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie  Opray

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get this. Opened the box & cleaned it & dropped it in the tank. Two weeks later cleaning the aquarium & brushed off the algae & the paint came off with it. Mostly just gray in color at that point. Defense do not recommend this product unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A Mangrove love
customer_reviews.text: This mangrove décor is beautiful. The color and the way its design is simply good. Although I thought it was going to be bigger it fits awesomely on my 40 gallon fish tank and it can't get any better. My fish love to swim in it and it was exactly what I imagined in my mind with my new setup. If you are thinking of buying it DO IT! I really really think you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Looks Amazing, but requires work
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful, but requires work. I used a hot glue gun to seal up the holes on the bottom b/c water gets trapped inside & starts to stink. Unfortunately, this created a new problem: It now floats. Burying the legs in 1.5 inches of sand kept it down, but I wish it was solid. Once you do a little work, it looks beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hermit crab tank. I bought the larger one. They LOVE....I mean LOVE crawling on this structure. It's big, the can fit thru the bottom, thru the holes. They sit on the tipy top. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl R.

customer_reviews.title: Paint comesoff easily and has some sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Paint comesoff easily and has some sharp edges. I took a dremel to those.It will also chip and break fairly easy. Between this and some other options, I don't think I will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: KRG

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This arrived broken in many pieces. Even the box had holes in it. But I contacted the merchant and very easily exchanged for a new one which arrived in tact. I've had no issues since then and it looks great in my tank
customer_reviews.author: Miriam M.

customer_reviews.title: Toxic?
customer_reviews.text: Was a good big size, very pretty and our 1yr old beta fish Titan loved swimming around it, until he died a week later. We sadly bought a new fish and then he also died after about a week. I'm almost positive that this has toxic paint or something and should not be used in aquariums. Unfortunately, the "return window" ended a few days ago and we just have to throw it away. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rushton

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 90 gallon tank with Angelfish. It is definitely their preferred "hiding spot". Is nice since they can still be seen, compared to hiding in rock formations.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTEN LAWRENCE

customer_reviews.title: Nice decor, watch out for jagged edges
customer_reviews.text: The styrofoam packaging is a bit messy, but the product itself looks nice, my tiger barbs like to swim through all the holes and gaps. Good idea to examine the decor when you get it, nearly cut my finger on a sharp (thumbtack-like) piece sticking out near the top, which I just simply chipped off (would have cut a fish if they rubbed against it, for sure.) Other than that, no problems, bit pricey but worth it for fish that would interact with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhin0

customer_reviews.title: changed look of my aquarium
customer_reviews.text: i have a 35g bowfront freshwater tank with the black aggregate and plastic plants. THe mangrove root looks awesome. No issue in shipping - came in perfect condition. It really looks good in the back center of the tank hiding the filter. I will definitely buy another for a different tank
customer_reviews.author: Matt J Erskine

customer_reviews.title: Large and well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very realistic looking piece that gives our aquarium so much life! We’ve had it in our freshwater aquarium for a few months now and I’ve noticed some of the paint is peeling. But, our fish are very destructive and I don’t believe it’s all the piece’s fault.
customer_reviews.author: Kate V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but it came broken.
customer_reviews.text: Nice but it came broken. It was packed well with styrofoam but the box itself looked like it went through a tornado. When I opened the box the styrofoam was all broken too! A good 4 inch chunk was broken off when I took it out of the box. I don’t want to take the time to make a trip to the post office to return it otherwise I would. Overall it’s a pretty cool piece for the aquarium. I would’ve given five stars if it wasn’t broken.
customer_reviews.author: marnin humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it balances the decorations in my Fluval Edge!
customer_reviews.text: This is in my Fluval Edge 12 gallon aquarium. I purchased that from Amazon also. I needed this plant to hide the submersible heater - also purchased from Amazon, lol - but I ended up laying the heater down on the back wall, so now this is just a decorative plant, but I really like the way it looks in the tank. I think it is perfect for my needs. I have tried to include a picture, so I hope you can see it. Everything but the gravel and fish was delivered to my door from Amazon. All of the other decorations and the thermometer are also from them.I absolutely "love" Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: shihtzumom

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing but still functional
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived double boxed with some styrofoam and a "leg" broken off with little pieces missing. I attempted to fix it and while fixing it you can see through little spots on the inside meaning that it would of broken regardless of how it was shipped. It looks good in the tank despite being able to see the hot glue I used to put it back together (hoping to hide it with some plants). Upon placing it in the tank air bubbles rushed out of holes that I didn't find while inspecting it before hand. It is also smaller than anticipated and appears a whole lot smaller than I wanted in my 75 gallon tank.
customer_reviews.author: Jw Roberts

customer_reviews.title: good addition to the tank
customer_reviews.text: Much less price than at the store, good look in the tank and the fish absolutely love it, especially the smaller fish, plenty of places for them to hide
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ball python loves it
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece, I got the large and it fits well in my cage. It came in double boxed no issues with breakage. Gives my 200g ball a nice place to play. Might be a bit small for a large adult but still think it will be ok in my cage since it fits snugly top to bottom and has a nice wide base to stand up on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my Oscar tank
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my Oscar tank. Looks great, stays firm in the tank. Can't think of anything wrong with this item but one thing: Smaller than I expected. Barely passes the half way mark of my tanks height ( 55 gallon: aprox. 21 inches tall ). I have a foot long piece of natural driftwood and my pleco still prefers for some reason to make this mangrove trunk his permanent home instead of the driftwood I have so neatly set up with rocks and plants having created a spacious hiding spot. I'm happy with this purchase and I do recommend this item but I would def get something taller for my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Merc83

customer_reviews.title: My betta gives this two fins up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 3 gallon cube betta tank. It looks large in this tank but not too large. The fish loves it and easily fits through some of the holes. he even leans on a particular section frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Great decorative piece
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Looks just like some sort of root. Using in a 20 gallon long and even snuggled down in the gravel it sticks up way to the top of glass lid. It's definitely substantial and heavy and looks totally real.
customer_reviews.author: Gnats

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I did not have any of the issues of chemical smells or paint chipping away that some other customers had. I know from experience some types of fish will pick away at certain ornaments and that may have been the cause in those cases.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great climbing toy for a snakes
customer_reviews.text: I like it alot and my snake love it alot but do you really have to pack it with the white stuff it goes all over
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great product - does not fit a 10 gallon!
customer_reviews.text: Technically it does, however it looks weird because its so big. Product came damaged, however this is a quality made beautiful piece for a much bigger aquarium !!
customer_reviews.author: Bri McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Fish really seem to love it
customer_reviews.text: I took of a star because it has a small break at the bottem. But you cant see it the rocks hid it. But I love this ornament
customer_reviews.author: SenaD

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and natural
customer_reviews.text: Looks very natural in the tank. I attached some java ferns to it and the fish have really seemed to take to it. It’s a little hard to clean around though, but that is the only negative I have for it.
customer_reviews.author: Meadowlark

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece for snakes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this piece for my full grown rainbow boa. It’s a very sturdy piece and looks ok. For you the money it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Harris

customer_reviews.title: A little extra work
customer_reviews.text: Like others said, there are holes in the bottom of the root that need to be filled otherwise water will penetrate the insides and mildew over time. I filled these with hot glue. Took me about 30 min, which isn’t bad considering the root is so pretty. If you don’t own a hot glue gun, I wouldn’t buy one, because these holes have to be filled somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Amy P.

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I mean I love the look of it but I have 2 plecos in the tank and they love to suck on it and I have noticed that they are sucking the paint off of it. There not dead so I guess it isn't harmful but it's starting to look kinda crappy.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: good mangrove root option for small-ish tanks
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this product, it looks exactly as it does in the picture. I got the medium size and it takes up a good amount of space in my 10 gallon tank, it's definitely the "centerpiece". My fish likes to swim around the roots and hide near the base of them. It looks nice and not garishly artificial, but it doesn't quite look real. Natural driftwood would be better for someone going for that look, but this is a good lazy person's alternative. My one complaint is that there were some sharp edges that I felt I needed to sand down before placing in the aquarium.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Just what my tank needed!
customer_reviews.text: Pictured in 29 gallon tank. Commanding centerpiece and the tallest/ largest I could find. Fits nicely and looks realistic. Did come packed in styrofoam that had broke up into hundreds of ball bits flying out of the box and sticking all over the peice making it hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took it out of the aquarium because pieces started falling ...
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of the aquarium because pieces started falling off it. It was in freshwater, so it's not that salt affected it. But if I touched it to move it, chunks would break off, and found at least one hole towards the bottom that I have no idea how it got there.
customer_reviews.author: It's me in central Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Great look for your aquarium
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, very sturdy made from what seems to be a durable material. Much larger than I expected and is almost sticking out the top of my 20 Gallon tank. Really wouldn't recommend it for a smaller tank. it honestly looks very natural and my schools of small tetras love to hang out inside of it. I added some aquarium plants under it to give it a natural feel, and the fish really seem to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Joram Tapiero

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my buy
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about pay shipping seems to be pretty good quality no problems yet
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good for reptiles too!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good addition to a reptile terrarium, although it did have a lot of sharp edges that I knocked off withs file
customer_reviews.author: Parth Patel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Wish there were more like these.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice decoration for our new aquarium. It's big and heavy, and I think the fish will love hiding in and around it. We placed a plant in the middle and out one of the holes for additional coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gergets

customer_reviews.title: nice, but traps bacteria
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my turtle tank. Started smelling right away. I think that bacteria or algae grow inside the hollow "branches" and it's impossible to clean it out completely. I've got it outside baking in the sun - if the smell dissipates I will put in back in the tank until it starts stinking again. The turtles liked perching on this while they slept.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Great decoration for tank
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of this fish decorating piece. It looks great in a tank.
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: This product looked fantastic! For about the first month, then it started to discolor and created a brown rusty color on some of the decor while other portions of it started to show the white material underneath. Very unhappy with product and will be returning. Definitely not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Werner

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Even though piece was topped and bottomed inside box with Styrofoam, it was broken on arrival. No exterior evidence of mishandling, but also not marked fragile. As if already broken when packed and the pieces laid in box. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: JoMc

customer_reviews.title: came broken in several pieces!
customer_reviews.text: This would have been nice if it came in one piece. I did contact people who make it no response so I glued it together and using it in fish tank. Would have been nice if Marina would respond!
customer_reviews.author: ronald d wilkin

customer_reviews.title: Little styrofoam balls everywhere
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice and all but there’s Styrofoam all over it so it’s a pain to clean right when you open it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Not just for fish!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this piece of decor!!! I actually use it in my bearded dragon tank for him to climb around on! He loves laying in various places on it and basking. It has held up to the heat really well and is easy to clean with a scrub brush. It also looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Kanderson

customer_reviews.title: perfect center piece in my 20 gallon tank
customer_reviews.text: perfect center piece in my 20 gallon tank. Fish like swimming through all the holes and my small catfish love to hid under the roots against the gravel.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Zatchey

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: very nice, my fish loves it, swimming around it and enjoying the multiple ins and outs
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Fish love it.
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged and looks great in my 55 gallon tank. The fish are hanging out in all the little nooks. They really seem to love it. It's hollow inside so if you have a burrowing fish/crustacean of some sort, they'll probably get inside it at some point- not inside the visible arches/holes in the picture, but actually inside the hollow construction of the unit. So don't be surprised if your burrowing creature disappears after placing this in the tank... they'll reappear eventually when they come out!
customer_reviews.author: puargs

customer_reviews.title: Looks ok hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my aquarium after cleaning it the best i could. All my fish died within 5 days
customer_reviews.author: jcww001

customer_reviews.title: Plecos love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool. My plecos love it and it's heavy enough that even my common can't knock it around the tank. I would say that you ought to be careful and fully bury all the feet because my bristlenose got herself stuck for a little while in one of the holes at the bottom of one foot. She did get out just fine and was not injured, but it's always scary to see them like that.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: Price is good. Great for larger fish, they won’t get stuck
customer_reviews.author: Whitefoote

customer_reviews.title: solid and will be a nice addition to my pond
customer_reviews.text: OK but over priced. Received my mangrove root today, solid and will be a nice addition to my pond, BUT, the item is much smaller than I thought it would be (did review the demensions on line) and the price is more than I would have spent (could have purchased for $10 less) at any retail/chain pet store.
customer_reviews.author: topdawg

customer_reviews.title: Great Centerpiece
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large Mangrove root for a 46 gallon tank of tropical community fish and I love that I can see through it from multiple angles. It gives my corydoras, loach, and rainbow sharks a place to find shelter and to scavenge over. My angels also like to swim through it! It doesn't look exactly like real wood (it's too grey), but a good replica. It also looks great with my live plants.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L

customer_reviews.title: Versatile aquarium decor
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece. It can be used for a pet snake or in a fish aquarium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All gifts
customer_reviews.text: This as all my other purchases are gifts but people that received them are happy
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Better than it looks
customer_reviews.text: It fits well in a ten gallon tank or larger. The favored decoration around here seems to be something of a big rook with a few holes they can swim through or sit in. The fish seem to like them but they are large blocking a lot of view. This root gives you great visibility and the fish love being able to swim in one hole with so many options to swim out, play inside, or find a protective place to hide.
customer_reviews.author: D. West

customer_reviews.title: Fugly
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed by this. Craftsmanship looks as if they used a brick and a can of "I dont give a shhh" to create
customer_reviews.author: Csy

customer_reviews.title: Peels
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to the reviews, the top cover has faded, looks like plastic, dead fish, cloudy water, removed it and water is now clear
customer_reviews.author: Macbeth

customer_reviews.title: Marina Decor Mangrove Root, Large
customer_reviews.text: The size is great, it's well built (feels sturdy), and I like that the paint is monotone. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Derik or Garin

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a natural look, but didn't have the budget or patience for driftwood. I ordered the large and the medium. The medium is a slightly different color, with more fake algae coloring. I don't mind this, though, as it helps make it look more varied and natural.
customer_reviews.author: j fam

customer_reviews.title: Small than expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and very natural the only downside is it’s a lot smaller than I expected but overall it’s a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Christie K

customer_reviews.title: Marina Decor Mangrove Root
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, because it adds to the overall decor of my aquarium. It provides a great hiding place for my discus as well. I have attached live plants to the back of my large mangrove root and its growing nicely.
customer_reviews.author: CassCT

customer_reviews.title: Not the most realistic looking but acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: It is hollow so I siliconed up the bottom of this piece. It doesn't look very realistic but maybe that will change as algae or moss grows on it. I'd choose something else if I could do it gain but now that I have plants weaving in and out of this it's likely a permanent decor in my tank. Most pet stores will have this on top of some shelf covered with dust so you can see it in person before buying it on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: D. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it so bad!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the medium for a 45 gallon tank. I absolutely loved it in the tank but after about a month the tank started to get really cloudy. I had read all the previous reviews about the fungus/ smell issue some folks had. I've done a 15% water change 3 days in a row without an improvement in water quality so I decided to take out the mangrove. Waiting to see if this is the issue. It did smell pretty bad when I took it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great decor!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome and I glue moss on it!! If you don't want it to change the color of your water you need to boiled it.
customer_reviews.author: orlando algarin

customer_reviews.title: Looks almost real
customer_reviews.text: The first time I bought this product it came broken into 4 or 5 pieces. It didn't shader because of careless shipping the thing is actually really fragile. so I called up wag.com and told them it broke and they had another one shipped right away and the customer service was amazing. They also let me keep the broken one and I just went to petco the next day and picked up some aquarium safe glue for 8 bucks. I ended up with two which turned out weird because they look exactly the same so I can't put them in the same tank. But over all the product is good lookin.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Iacobacci

customer_reviews.title: I have not seen and smelled any issues like other reviews
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen and smelled any issues like other reviews. I cleaned it really good prior to placing in the tank. Also made sure to remove all the packing peanut material, they should probably ship with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas T.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look real at all, but makes a good home for my little girl :)
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. It does look pretty fake. My female cockatoo cichlid has made it her home. The insides of the legs on this thing are hollow, so she burrowed under all of them to figure out which one had the most space and now lives inside one of the legs. She wiggles in and out on her side which is SUPER cool to see and very adorable lol.
customer_reviews.author: abaglivi

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing - we got the large
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Sturdy and huge. Turtle likes climbing on it, getting under it. Be aware it is huge! We bought the large and it takes up a full corner of our 55 gallon tank and sticks out of the water about 3 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Couch Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for my cichlids
customer_reviews.text: I have a proverbial "ton" of rocks for my cichlid tank, and they are so cumbersome and annoying, so this was a much appreciated addition given it weighs a fraction of my rocks. Sits very stable and is a good anchor for other pieces to rest on. It's my Jack Dempsey's favorite spot.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta Fox

customer_reviews.title: Worth it? Maybe.
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews... Plugged the holes on the bottom "feet" of the structure to avoid the stagnant stink... THERE ARE HOLES ALL OVER.... What a pain
customer_reviews.author: eli

customer_reviews.title: Great piece, bad shipping method.
customer_reviews.text: The piece is great. It looks awesome in my tank and I cannot wait to see the fish swimming in and out of the nooks and crannies. However, whoever thought it was a good idea to ship it in styrofoam should be fired. The styrofoam gets up inside the hollow portions of the decoration, and it took a thorough washing to get all the little chunks out before putting it in the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous decorations
customer_reviews.text: Love how natural it looks- 2nd one and gonna add 3 more eventually
customer_reviews.author: Christopher k. Paquette

product_meta.title: Marina Decor
product_meta.description: Pattern Name:Mangrove Root| Size:LargeThe Marina Mangrove Ornament is the perfect way to customize your aquarium. It is designed to mimic mangrove roots found in nature. The Marina Mangrove Ornament is brown with grey accents and will be the perfect addition for your fish to swim through or hide around.
feature_bullets: Decoration that closely mimics true mangrove roots found in nature
Safe and non toxic; won't harm your fish
Measures 12.7 inches wide x 11.2 inches long x 9 inches tall
